item.title: Linear regression: R-Downloads around the world
item.description: 1 Summary 2 Question 3 Dataset description 4 Linear regression - why use it? 5 Results 6 What does it mean? 1 Summary To see the code used in this post, visit my kernel on kaggle in R Markdown format.
